About Me

This is only the first step to creating a back end for the applications. In the next module, we'll learn about two very important concepts in web development: test-driven development (TDD) and object-oriented programming (OOP). These two concepts will help us make our applications more predictable and less likely to encounter unforeseen issues, in turn making us much better developers!

run-buddy

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

That's a lot to take on, and some of it may still be difficult to fully understand. Luckily, this is only the beginning of the path to learning Node.js and the new features brought about by the JavaScript ES6 specification, and you'll have plenty more exposure and practice in the coming weeks.

horsensian

These two concepts will help us make our applications more predictable and less likely to encounter unforeseen issues, in turn making us much better developers!
